title: front-end development
description: Integrate multiple front-end development tools and languages to build a handy front-end application.
Proficient in modern web development using React and state management tools such as Redux Toolkit.
Be able to incorporate front-end skills into a MERN project.

title: back-end development
description: Be able to build a MongoDB database for using in applications.
Construct a server along with an API to allow a communication between a server and a client.
Be able to incorporate back-end skills into a MERN project.

title: other skills
description: Competent in SQL queries such as subqueries.
Deploy web applications via either Heroku or Netlify.
Build a full-stack application using MERN tech stack.
